attributes.action: abolish planned amendments to Data Protection Act to allow sharing of personal data between public and private sectors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent press articles have highlighted this amendment which will allow sharing of personal data between the private and public sectors.

The Data Protection Act in its current state hardly gives the individual much protection over their personal data.

This petition is to protect individuals from the privacy and security concerns affected by this amendment.
